doc:
Ray Myers https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ray_Myers 0 Ray Myers (June 21, 1889 – November 4, 1956) was an American film actor and director of the silent film era. He appeared in 43 films between 1912 and 1924. He also directed five films between 1910 and 1915, including The Siege and Fall of the Alamo (1914), now considered a lost film. Only a few still photographs remain at the Library of Congress. He was born in Hot Springs, Arkansas and died in Los Angeles, California. Ray_Myers ( June_21_,_1889 – November_4_,_1956 ) was an_American_film_actor_and_director of the_silent_film_era . He appeared in 43_films between 1912_and_1924 . He also directed five_films between 1910_and_1915 , including The_Siege_and_Fall of the_Alamo_(_1914_) , now_considered a_lost_film . Only_a_few still photographs remain at the_Library of Congress . He was_born in Hot_Springs , Arkansas and died in Los_Angeles , California .
